description: Folk is a CRM for building relationships at scale. Manage your contacts, companies, and relationships in one place.

actions.name: createCompany
actions.description: Create a new company in your Folk workspace. You can add emails, links, phone numbers, and assign it to a group.

actions.name: createPerson
actions.description: Create a new person in your Folk workspace. You can link them to a company, add contact details, and assign to a group.

actions.name: findCompany
actions.description: Search for companies in your Folk workspace by name or email address.

actions.name: findPerson
actions.description: Retrieve a paginated list of people in your Folk workspace with optional filtering.

actions.name: getCompany
actions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a company from your Folk workspace.

actions.name: getPerson
actions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a person from your Folk workspace.

actions.name: updateCompany
actions.description: Update an existing company in your Folk workspace. Select the company from the dropdown to update its details.

actions.name: updatePerson
actions.description: Update an existing person in your Folk workspace with new information.

triggers.name: company_added
triggers.description: Fires when a new company is added to your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: company_custom_field_updated
triggers.description: Fires when a company's group assignments are updated in your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: company_removed
triggers.description: Fires when a company is removed from your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: company_updated
triggers.description: Fires when a company is updated in your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: person_added
triggers.description: Fires when a new person is added to your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: person_custom_field_updated
triggers.description: Fires when a person's group assignments are updated in your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: person_removed
triggers.description: Fires when a person is removed from your Folk workspace.

triggers.name: person_updated
triggers.description: Fires when a person is updated in your Folk workspace.
